sourcesContent:
💼 Expense Tracker

Smarter money, simpler living.

🧾 What is Expense Tracker?

Expense Tracker is a smart personal finance dashboard that helps you organize your monthly spending, manage recurring bills, and monitor your credit balance — all in one place.

💡 Why Use It?

  • Stay on top of your budget: Get a clear breakdown of where your money goes.
  • Avoid missed payments: Track due dates and installments...
  • Visualize your progress: See trends, savings...
  • Private and secure: Your data is only accessible to you.

📊 What Can You Do With It?

  • Track all your expenses by category, method, location
  • Manage bills with a smart calendar
  • Monitor credit card trends monthly
  • View summaries to make better decisions

👩‍💻 Developed By

Vinithya Reddy Podduturi

Software Developer & UI Enthusiast

GitHub | LinkedIn
